parameters.name: BandwidthWeighting
parameters.description:
The bandwidth weight.

The supported values vary with instance types. You can query the bandwidth weights supported by the current instance type by using the [DescribeInstanceTypes](~~2679699~~).

Valid values:

*   Vpc-L1: Vpc-L1.
*   Vpc-L2: Vpc-L2.
*   Ebs-L1: Ebs-L1.
*   Ebs-L2: Ebs-L2.
*   Default: the Default.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance whose network bandwidth weight is to be modified.
